page.title: 10POPULATION OF WHALSAY
page.content:
Over the past 25 years the number of people on Whalsay has increased from 764 to 1038.This is because more children have been born. Family size is above the national average.For children at our school the average family size is 2.8.In our class there are 13 who belong to a family with 4 children, 1 to a family of 5 children.The population for Whalsay is as follows:-
0-4 5-15 16-24 25-44 45-59 60+ ____________________________________ {93 215 137 289 147 160 In our{school}there are{185 pupils; {115}in the{primary}classes,{70}in the {secondary.}When you are 14 you have the choice of either going to the {Anderson High School}in{Lerwick}or staying on at the school here until you leave at the age of 16.
